title: Change Pixel 3's default back-up email?
content: I got married in November and made a new email with my new last name. I have switched every account except I haven't been able to figure out how to adjust any of my Google accounts. I want to keep my phone's data (specifically photos) but can't seem to find a straightforward way to keep photos and also change my default account.
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 3
